import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import {listProductDetails} from '../actions/productActions' function ProductScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) let { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) }, []) let product = {} return (
